text: iF-22 Raptor is a video game developed by American studio Magic Labs and published by Interactive Magic for Windows. iF-22 Raptor was first released in 1997iF-22 Raptor Air Superiority Fighter By Al Giovetti, thecomputershow.com ==Gameplay== iF-22 Raptor is a military flight simulator. ==Reception== Next Generation reviewed the PC version of the game, rating it three stars out of five, and stated that "There's a lot here for the casual pilot, and something for the flight fan, but for the hard-core sim purist, it's just not anything to shout about." ==Reviews== *Computer Gaming World #159 (Oct 1997) *PC Zone #55 (1997 October) *PC Games - Jan 07, 1998 *GameStar - Dec, 1997 *GameStar - Dec, 1998 *Computer Gaming World - Mar, 1998 ==References== Category:1997 video games Category:Combat flight simulators Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Windows-only games
title: IF-22 Raptor
